citations.narrative:
Inside the indoor housing building, there is a buildup of dirt on the walls of the enclosures at the level of the dogs.
The dirt buildup increases the risk of disease hazards to the dogs. All surfaces that the dogs come in contact with
must be cleaned and sanitized every two weeks.
Affects nine dogs
Correct by 08/06/14
Exit interview conducted with facility representative

narrative:
3.1(c)(3)
HOUSING FACILITIES, GENERAL.
Inside the indoor housing building, there is a buildup of dirt on the walls of the enclosures at the level of the dogs. 
The dirt buildup increases the risk of disease hazards to the dogs.  All surfaces that the dogs come in contact with
must be cleaned and sanitized every two weeks.  
Affects nine dogs
Correct by 08/06/14
Exit interview conducted with facility representative
